desc: At Golden Mayer, we take great pride in design and hand-craftsmanship of our Furniture products. Our in-house designers create designs that solve practical problems and meet right aesthetics. Our designs blend contemporary sensibilities with traditions of excellence in craftsmanship and quality.

layout.text: At Golden Mayer all our products are exclusively handcrafted by our artisans specific to your needs, We believe in high quality products delivered at affordable prices to suit everyone's needs.
